SEARCH
Package uk.msci.project.rsa

Class GenView

java.lang.Object
uk.msci.project.rsa.GenView
public class GenView extends Object
The domain object corresponding to GenView FXML file that will serve as a controllers interface into observing and manipulating the graphical layout of the view.

      public GenView()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initialises the domain object class. This method is automatically called after the FXML file has been loaded. It sets up the toggle group for cross-benchmarking options.

    • addSmallEToggleGroupChangeObserver

      public void addSmallEToggleGroupChangeObserver(javafx.beans.value.ChangeListener<javafx.scene.control.Toggle> observer)
      Registers an observer for when the small e toggle changes value.
      Parameters:
      observer - The observer to be registered.

    • getSmallEToggle

      public String getSmallEToggle()
      Gets the selected option for whether to use a small public exponent in the generation of kay.
      Returns:
      String representing the selected cross-parameter benchmarking option.

    • getCrossBenchMarkingToggle

      public String getCrossBenchMarkingToggle()
      Gets the selected option for cross-parameter benchmarking.
      Returns:
      String representing the selected cross-parameter benchmarking option.

      Sets the visibility of the failure popup.
      Parameters:
      visible - A boolean to set the popup's visibility.

    • getDynamicKeyData

      public List<javafx.util.Pair<int[],Boolean>> getDynamicKeyData()
      Retrieves a list of key parameters (sizes and small e options) specified by the user.
      Returns:
      List of Pair objects containing the key parameters. Each Pair consists of an array of integers representing key sizes and a Boolean indicating the small 'e' option.

    • getDynamicKeyConfigurationsData

      public List<javafx.util.Pair<int[],Boolean>> getDynamicKeyConfigurationsData()
      Retrieves the dynamic key configurations data specified by the user.
      Returns:
      A list of pairs, each containing key configuration parameters and a boolean indicating the use of a small 'e' value.

    • getDynamicKeySizeData

      public List<Integer> getDynamicKeySizeData()
      Retrieves a list of key sizes specified by the user in comparison mode.
      Returns:
      List containing the specified key sizes, where each element in the list is an Integer.

    • getNumTrials

      public int getNumTrials()
      Retrieves the number of trials specified for key generation.
      Returns:
      int representing the number of trials.

    • addCrossParameterToggleObserver

      public void addCrossParameterToggleObserver(javafx.beans.value.ChangeListener<Boolean> observer)
      Adds an observer for the Cross-Parameter toggle switch.
      Parameters:
      observer - the observer to be notified when the toggle state changes.

    • setSelectedCrossParameterToggleObserver

      public void setSelectedCrossParameterToggleObserver(boolean isSelected)
      Sets the selected state of the Cross-Parameter toggle switch.
      Parameters:
      isSelected - true to select the toggle switch, false otherwise.

    • addCrossParameterRadioChangeObserver

      public void addCrossParameterRadioChangeObserver(javafx.beans.value.ChangeListener<javafx.scene.control.Toggle> observer)
      Adds an observer for changes in the provable scheme selection.
      Parameters:
      observer - the observer to be notified when the scheme selection changes.

    • getNumKeyConfigs

      public int getNumKeyConfigs()
      Retrieves the number of key configurations specified by the user in the initialisation of custom cross parameter benchmarking session.
      Returns:
      number represent the current number of key configurations.

    • getKeyConfigToHashFunctionsMap

      public Map<Integer,List<HashFunctionSelection>> getKeyConfigToHashFunctionsMap()
      Retrieves the mapping of key configuration groups to their respective hash functions. This method is used to obtain the configured hash functions for each group of keys in the cross-parameter benchmarking mode.
      Returns:
      A map where each key is a group index and the value is a list of hash function selections.

    • getKeysPerGroup

      public int getKeysPerGroup()
      Gets the number of keys per group in the cross-parameter benchmarking mode. This value is essential for organising the key groups and associating them with their respective hash function selections.
      Returns:
      int representing the number of keys per group.
